author: Ben Shapiro
description:
PDS Debt - PDS Debt is offering a free debt analysis. It only takes thirty seconds. Get yours at https://PDSDebt.com/shapiro.

Biden is racing to auction off parts of the border wall before they can be utilized. Ben discusses Trump’s expected plan to use an executive order to restart construction almost immediately once he takes office. He also talks about NATO chief Mark Rutte’s recent press conference, during which he says it’s time to shift to a wartime mindset. Trump believes Europe should take the lead with the war in Ukraine and says he wants to see a strong, well-armed Ukraine emerge from a cessation of fighting. Ben also discusses the DOJ’s report, which reveals the FBI’s lack of canvassing and preparation before January 6th.

title: Biden Is AUCTIONING Off The Border Wall

author: Ben Shapiro
description:
Dr. Kevin Roberts is the President of The Heritage Foundation, a conservative think tank that plays a central role in hosting national public policy debates among the political right. In his new book, “Dawn’s Early Light,” Roberts offers a diagnosis of America’s most urgent problems, as well as a series of policy prescriptions for a more prosperous future. In this episode of The Sunday Special, Kevin discusses the tradeoffs inherent to policymaking, why Republicans must not neglect fiscal conservatism any longer, and which executive agency he would reform first. Roberts also injects nuance into our foreign policy debates and explains why some institutions are not even worth overhauling. Stay tuned, and welcome back to another episode of The Sunday Special.

author: Ben Shapiro
description:
Joe Biden is still wildly unpopular and will be leaving office in infamy. Only 2 in 10 Americans approve of him pardoning his son. Ben discusses Bill Clinton’s latest interview, where he states that the Trump administration made up Hillary’s classified email claims, yet goes on to say that maybe he should talk to Biden about a preemptive pardon for Hillary. Ben also talks about the recent good news for Republicans. The 5th Circuit stated that the SEC’s policy for NASDAQ is a violation of the law, and their adversity mandate is a joke. Lastly, he talks about Justin Trudeau bashing Americans for not electing Hillary or Kamala.
